Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Resurrected creatures in the forest threaten the balance of Blessing Basin.

Kill {@LinkCreature:26#2001#revivified cromoses}, {@LinkCreature:26#2002#revivified noruks}, and {@LinkCreature:26#2003#resurgent ghilliedhus}.

Report to Chian when mission is complete.
You’ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven’t completed your mission yet.
